1. Grant of License. Licensor hereby grants to Licensee a non‑exclusive, worldwide, royalty‑free license to use, reproduce, and display the Software solely for internal business purposes.
2. Intellectual Property. All intellectual property rights in the Software remain with Licensor. Licensee shall not claim any ownership over the Software.
